sentences.sContent: We can wash in the stream near the campsite.
sentences.sContent_eng: We can wash in the stream near the campsite.
sentences.sCn: 我们可以在营地附近的小溪里洗澡。

sentences.sContent: The smell of the food might attract dangerous animals to our campsite.
sentences.sContent_eng: The smell of the food might attract dangerous animals to our campsite.
sentences.sCn: 食物的气味还可能会招引危险的动物到我们的营地来。

sentences.sContent: I showed up at the campsite one morning to find them loading their carts.
sentences.sContent_eng: I showed up at the campsite one morning to find them loading their carts.
sentences.sCn: 一天早晨，我在营地发现他们正往大篷车里搬家什。

remMethod.val: camp(露营) + site(地点) → 露营的地点 → 营地

trans.tranOther: an area where people can camp, often with a water supply and toilets
